alert.note: Alert for Northern and Interior Seward Peninsula (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 19 at 4:39PM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING FOR AN ICE JAM NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 PM AKDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by an ice jam continues. * WHERE...Buckland River near Buckland. * WHEN...Until 200 PM AKDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Significant flooding is occurring in Buckland. Water levels in Buckland will rise rapidly in the next hour and flood most of the roads in the village and could push ice into the village. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - As of 4pm AKDT, Residents of Buckland reported that an ice jam remains in place just downstream of Buckland. Another ice jam upstream of Buckland has broken free and is sending rising water and large chunks of ice downstream into Buckland. This will cause water levels in Buckland to rise in the next hour and could push ice into town. - Http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood - If you live near or along the Buckland River, take action now to protect life and property.
info.instruction: Stay away or be swept away. River banks and culverts can become unstable and unsafe.
